Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line  trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Illinois Medical District. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line  trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Illinois Medical District.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Chicago. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Chicago. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green and Pink Line Service Delayed at Clinton
ShortDescription: Green and Pink Line trains are standing near Clinton due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green and Pink Line trains are standing near Clinton due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
